file_content.text: My men are working as fast as they can. The factory's going full steam. What more do you want?
This is the third time you've been late with a shipment. Perhaps it's time to find a new foreman.
You want droid-produced scrap metal, go ahead. But you won't get Balmorran know-how.
Here, we do weapons right, or we don't do 'em at all. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
You have your extension. But if there's another delay, your know-how won't save you.
